mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO student(id, name, grade, grade_class, phone, age, gender, station,url) VALUES
(#{tag.id},#{tag.name},#{tag.grade},#{tag.grade_class},#{tag.phone},#{tag.age},#{tag.gender},#{tag.station},#{tag.url})
LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR} INTO TABLE student CHARACTER SET utf8 FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' LINES TERMINATED BY '\n'
